name: mvlrmuli
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: eqtr3i(c0, co(c1, cdiv, c2), co(co(c0, cmul, c2), cdiv, c2))

body.origin:
|- wceq(c0, co(c1, cdiv, c2))
-| wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, c2), cdiv, c2), c0)
-| wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, c2), cdiv, c2), co(c1, cdiv, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, co(c1, cdiv, c2))
-| wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, c2), cdiv, c2), c0)
-| wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, c2), cdiv, c2), co(c1, cdiv, c2))

body.origin:
|- wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, c2), cdiv, c2), c0)
-| wcel(c0, cc)
-| wcel(c2, cc)
-| wne(c2, nat0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, co(c1, cdiv, c2))
-| wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, c2), cdiv, c2), co(c1, cdiv, c2))
-| wcel(c0, cc)
-| wcel(c2, cc)
-| wne(c2, nat0)

stmt.origin: oveq1i(co(c0, cmul, c2), cdiv, c2, c1)

body.origin:
|- wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, c2), cdiv, c2), co(c1, cdiv, c2))
-| wceq(co(c0, cmul, c2), c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, co(c1, cdiv, c2))
-| wcel(c0, cc)
-| wcel(c2, cc)
-| wne(c2, nat0)
